mcq.statement: Identify the sentence with incorrect use of conversational turn-turning and transition.A) I'm going to the store, but I need to get milk.

options.a: I'm going to the store, but I need to get milk.
options.b: 1 love reading books. Also I love watching movies.
options.c: I'm tired, therefore I'm going to bed.
options.d: I went to the party; however, I didn't have fun
